What Freedom "is" depends on your paradigm, and more importantly...who controls that paradigm. In this world the United States defines what freedom "is"...To everybody else on this planet "we are the best examples of it" and being the "Best Example" of something in life...over time...ultimatly gives you the power to redefine it.
 
 Just last night the President said "We are bringing Freedom to the middle east...(Again)" A.k.a. Democracy. Of course its a good thing! They had crazy lives before we were there...(weather they liked it or not...thats another story.) Instead I ask you to bring your attention to the Countries that brought freedom upon themselves...ever been to one? I have..in fact I lived in many. I tell you that it is in those places that the true definition of freedom roams. Living in America and never traveling out...watching American TV\News...You are told what your definition of freedom is...Guess what...Thats the way they want it...and thats what they dont want you to understand. You dont think the Government thinks this hard about things? I promise you they do...thats their Business. Why would they sit back and "hope" you see things their way...when they can make you see things their way...and on top of it...make it seem like it was your bright idea in the first place! Look at the Patriot Act! We got ****ed in the XXX on that one..ever read it?
 
 Life is changing for everybody on this planet...everybody has the potential to be hit by terrorists...guess what... "terrorists" were not invented on Sept 11...getting attacked on our own soil HAS happened before... so dont give me that line. Do not think I am cracking on "America" ...I am cracking on you if you dont notice the removal of our freedom.
 
 I have posted the following on another thread please permit the redundancy:
 
 If you dropped a frog in boiling water, it would instantly jump out. However, if you dropped a frog in cool water and very gradually raised the heat, the frog would adjust... and not notice how hot it was until it was too late...
 
 Forget that its about a stupid frog for a minute...and recognize that we do the same thing in our lives everyday...
 
 Free? Compaired to who? Korea Yes, but to the rest of the FREE world...we are fools with blind folds on. Our industry attracts people here, not our so called "freedom".
 
 Did you notice the Gov was turning up the heat? Dont feel bad...most people dont.

What Freedom "is" depends on your paradigm, and more importantly...who controls that paradigm. In this world the United States defines what freedom "is"...To everybody else on this planet "we are the best examples of it" and being the "Best Example" of something in life...over time...ultimatly gives you the power to redefine it.
 
 

 
 If these opinions are well supported by evidence, perhaps you could mention some of it ?

If these opinions are well supported by evidence, perhaps you could mention some of it ?

 
 I cannot think of a subject that blankets the whole world that fits this description. I pose to you this example. If I make widgets that are round, and the entire world comes to me for my example on how to make them...then I change them from round to square..but I still call them widgets! Since I have earned the trust and attention of the entire world for my widget making...and since I am the best example of a widget maker..and I am (seeming) successful... people will follow me, thinking this is the natural evolution of widgets...after a while people will say... Remember when widgets were round? Hey why are they square anyway? Oh well must be for a good reason...
 
 Thats a dead Frog.
Then again, they might just go buy off someone else who was making round ones.

 Does this parable mean that America is the only "fountain of freedom" from which the entire world must get in line to drink ? Has no other nation ever built its own fountain ?

Does this parable mean that America is the only "fountain of freedom" from which the entire world must get in line to drink ? Has no other nation ever built its own fountain ?

 
 QUITE the contrary..I refer you to my original post, as I started this thread.
 
 We are not the only fountain..but we are made to seem like the best example when we are not. The best fountains of freedom are the ones created on their own with just the concept of freedom in their minds..not the example portrayed by the U.S.

 Sorry if I misunderstood: however, you do say that "In this world the United States defines what freedom is" (for some reason you put quotes around "is").
 
 Wouldn't any reasonable person conclude what you meant was that the freedom of everybody else was informed by the American example ?

 I put quotes around is because what they say "it" is...isnt really what it is at all..but comming from us, who would second guess it.
